  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/RuthGeorge6" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Ruth George</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/RuthGeorge6">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">RuthGeorge6</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">The official account of Labour MP for High Peak. Mum of 4, fighting for the communities of High Peak. For casework please email <a href="https://t.co/WEI13E5BxD" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ruth.george" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://ruth.george"><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ruth.george</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a>.mp@parliament.uk</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Whaley Bridge, England

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url ">

    ruthforhighpeak.co.uk
  </a>

</span>
      </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Brilliant to welcome <a href="/Rory_Palmer" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="22625989"><s>@</s><b>Rory_Palmer</b></a> to High Peak as East Midlands Labour MEP. Excellent discussions on Brexit with young people and Labour members.<a href="https://t.co/buVt7IZtq1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/rory_palmer/status/972193600841895941" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/rory_palmer/status/972193600841895941"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/rory_palmer/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/972193600841895941</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Ruth George added,</p>

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Ruth George Retweeted The Grapevine</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">It was a real pleasure to meet everyone and see the great atmosphere at <a href="/BuxtonGrapevine" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1060782950"><s>@</s><b>BuxtonGrapevine</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ARUgrYHYy1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/buxtongrapevine/status/961606353155493888" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/buxtongrapevine/status/961606353155493888"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/buxtongrapevin</span><span class="invisible">e/status/961606353155493888</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Saw far too much third party harassment of shopworkers in my time at <a href="/UsdawUnion" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="412204694"><s>@</s><b>UsdawUnion</b></a> definitely need to <a href="/hashtag/BringBackSec40?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BringBackSec40</b></a> to make employers responsible so they exclude harassers from the workplace <a href="/hashtag/PresidentsClub?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PresidentsClub</b></a><a href="https://t.co/veLqoEWB6c" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/dawnbutlerbrent/status/956249116186763265" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/dawnbutlerbrent/status/956249116186763265"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/dawnbutlerbren</span><span class="invisible">t/status/956249116186763265</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Enjoyed my appearance on <a href="/BBCSunPolEM" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1077082315"><s>@</s><b>BBCSunPolEM</b></a> I will keep challenging the Tories lazy and incorrect claim that the state of public services is due to Labour incompetence, when they have added nearly 1trillion to UK debt but no investment to show for it<a href="https://t.co/rmaseBt1S2" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbcsunpolem/status/952467277991088128" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbcsunpolem/status/952467277991088128"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbcsunpolem/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/952467277991088128</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Ruth George added,</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Ruth George Retweeted UK Prime Minister</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Who wants to oversee 12bn cuts to the poorest and most disadvantaged, the impoverishment of over a million more children, and putting a quarter of UK families onto UC at a rate below the breadline? Only the Bedroom Tax Minister<a href="https://t.co/39BCWgsxwQ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/number10gov/status/950464726638776320" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/number10gov/status/950464726638776320"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/number10gov/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/950464726638776320</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Ruth George added,</p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">

My thoughts are with Sue and his family.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Ruth George Retweeted Alex Sobel MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Pleased to sign letter with over 100 colleagues asking for Theresa May to rescind the invitation to Donald Trump next year<a href="https://t.co/Wxe4nkuc2i" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/alexsobel/status/940951027158867969" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/alexsobel/status/940951027158867969"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/alexsobel/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/940951027158867969</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Ruth George added,</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Ruth George Retweeted Jeremy Corbyn</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Govt have just refused to publish a full Impact Assessment of <a href="/hashtag/UniversalCredit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UniversalCredit</b></a> for another 5 years. Appalling lack of scrutiny<a href="https://t.co/K59x1UIGv0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/938119747308310529" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/938119747308310529"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/938119747308310529</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Minister refuses to produce Impact Assmt of <a href="/hashtag/UniversalCredit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UniversalCredit</b></a> until 2022.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Well done <a href="/AngelaRayner" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="222748037"><s>@</s><b>AngelaRayner</b></a> highlighting growing rural poverty- we know to our cost in High Peak that rural services are hit hardest by cuts<a href="https://t.co/sQ9w1mJLbc" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/angelarayner/status/935440293364686848" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/angelarayner/status/935440293364686848"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/angelarayner/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/935440293364686848</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Ruth George added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/AngelaRayner/status/935440293364686848" data-conversation-id="935440293364686848" aria-hidden="true">

    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="935440293364686848" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="AngelaRayner" data-user-id="222748037" href="/AngelaRayner/status/935440293364686848" data-conversation-id="935440293364686848" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Angela Rayner</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>AngelaRayner</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Britain is in a spiral of ever-growing division with rural and coastal regions being left behind, warns social mobility tsar. The Tories have completely failed on social mobility. <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://amp.theguardian.com/society/2017/nov/28/disadvantaged-children-face-worse-outcomes-in-rich-areas-report-finds" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://amp.theguardian.com/society/2017/nov/28/disadvantaged-children-face-worse-outcomes-in-rich-areas-report-finds"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">amp.theguardian.com/society/2017/n</span><span class="invisible">ov/28/disadvantaged-children-face-worse-outcomes-in-rich-areas-report-finds</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Excellent Westminster Hall debate on flawed govt roll out of 30hrs. Glad we managed to grab the minister afterwards to hold him to account.<a href="https://t.co/CxoGb4rsGj" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CxoGb4rsGj</a></p>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Damian Hebron</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>DamianHebron</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Debating <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>artshealthwellbeing</b></span> <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="528919691"><s>@</s><b>RuthGeorge6</b></span> says arts projects help people in ways the NHS is often unable to <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>westminsterhalldebate</b></span></div>

Per the decision on Universal Credit <a href="/hashtag/cpc2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>cpc2017</b></a></p>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="911552188920496128" id="stream-item-tweet-911552188920496128" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;911552188920496128&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <td colspan="3">
         <a class="js-initial-focus" target="_blank" href="http://support.twitter.com/articles/14226-how-to-find-your-twitter-short-code-or-long-code" rel="noopener">See SMS short codes for other countries</a>
      </td>
    </tr>
  </tfoot>
</table>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
